colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (SNYIGS MA'I LNGA YI TSA GDUNGS DANG, KLU BDUD TSOGS KYI DMAG DPUNG GI ,CHOS TSER GNOD PAR GYUR BA'I DUS, DGE NYAM PAR 'JOMS BYED CING, GZA' DANG BTZAN YANG PHAN 'GYUR BA'I, NGO MTSAR GANG @007A *, ,RGYANGS DRAG PO 'DI, RIG PA SMRA ZHING SNGAGS 'CHANG BA'I, DGE SLONG MKHA' LDING RNAL 'BYOR PA, BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS, SNGON GYI DAM PA'I BZHUGS GNAS MCHOG ,THUGS RJES GTOR GYI DAM NAS CHE, GLENG NA BZHENGS NGANG 'DRA BA YI, RI BO MCHOD PA'I TSUL YANG LDAN GZHANG DANG 'DRA BA'I MDUN NA NI, RJE BTZUN MA YI YONGS SKYOBS CING, MKHA' BA'I MANG PO BRTEN PA'I SA, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO ZHES GRAGS PA'I, DBUS KYI LTE BA'I SA YI CHU, RGYAL MTSAN MTHON PO'I DBUS KYI CHA, BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU 'BOD PA'I, RDO RJE'I GZHAL YAS KHANG CHEN RNAMS, RNAM PAR BSGRAGS PA'I NGA RO YI GNAS 'DIR GNOD PA'I YID 'CHANG BA'I, GZA' DANG RIMS KYI BLO BZANG, BTZAN DANG BDUD KYI TSOGS RNAMS DANG, KLU YI DMAG DPUNG THAMS CAD NI, RAB TU 'DAR ZHING SDANGS GYUR NAS, RI RAB KHUNG DU DRAG BROS STE, DGON GNAS NYER 'TSE DANG BRAL BAS, BDE BA'I DPAL LA SPYOD PAR 'GYUR,)
